Parameters:
length - the length of the vibrating string
speed - the speed
f - the initial function
g - the second function
precision - the precision
timePrec - the time precision
harmonicComp - the harmonic component

                           double a,
                           double b,
                           IMathFunction f)
Calculate the fourier coefficient using simpson's adaptive quadrature method

Parameters:
n - the nth value to solve in the loop
a - the first x-value
b - the last x-value
f - the function for which the coefficient should be calculated
Returns:
the coefficient
